subject: Re: [junit] open source projects using junit
msgSnippet: ... There are literally dozens. Most of the Jakarta projects among them, and that s not including the OS projects that build on JUnit, like JUnit-addons and
messageBody:
>So said Christian Pekeler on 2003-08-10 --------------------
>I would like to know which open source projects use junit. The only one
>I can think of is Eclipse. If you know of any others, please reply
>directly to me. I'll summarize to the list.

There are literally dozens. Most of the Jakarta projects among them, and that's not including the OS projects that build on JUnit, like JUnit-addons and HTMLUnit.



J. B. Rainsberger,
President, Diaspar Software Services
Let's write software that people understand.
